window.diagram

Class DiagramSubwindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • window.Subwindow
      • window.diagram.DiagramSubwindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Subwindow>, Clickable, IActionHandler, ILowLevelController

extends Subwindow
implements IActionHandler
